headline: A Look At Brown & Brown (BRO) Valuation After Market Trends Report And Risk Strategies Combination
summary: Why Brown & Brown’s latest update matters for shareholders Brown & Brown (BRO) has completed a long running share repurchase plan and released its 2026 Market Trends report, giving investors fresh information on both capital returns and conditions across commercial, benefits, and personal insurance markets. See our latest analysis for Brown & Brown. At a share price of $69.53, Brown & Brown has seen a 12.05% 1 month share price decline and a 10.42% year to date share price decline. Its 5 year...

headline: Brown & Brown (BRO) Announces Accelerated Share Repurchase, Flags Evolving Market Trends
summary: Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO) is included among the 13 Cheapest Dividend Aristocrats to Invest in. On February 12, Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO) announced the launch of a $250 million accelerated share repurchase program with Bank of America, N.A. The move falls under the company’s broader $1.5 billion share buyback authorization that the board […]

headline: Wells Fargo Maintains Equal-Weight on Brown & Brown, Lowers Price Target to $78
summary: Wells Fargo  analyst Elyse Greenspan   maintains Brown & Brown (NYSE:BRO) with a Equal-Weight and lowers the price target from $82 to $78.
